decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers:
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).

| The hereby approved rooflights to the roof slope of the hereby development shall be Conservation style rooflights and lie flush with the roof and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason:  To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the conservation area in accordance with policies D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013). | The extensions hereby approved to Nos. 4 and 6 Osterley Lane shall be constructed and completed simultaneously in accordance with the drawings listed in Condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the development does not result in detrimental residential amenity impacts in accordance with the National Planning Framework (2023), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan 2021, policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Local Development Framework (Core) Strategy (2012); and policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan (2013).
description: 6 Osterley Lane - Two storey side/rear extension; 4 Osterley Lane - Additional storey to bungalow, single storey rear extension (Following demolition of existing conservatory) - Joint Application
